    • Method Detail

      • assertGeneratedMatchesExpected

        public static void assertGeneratedMatchesExpected(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFolder generatedFolder,
                                                  org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject modelProject,
                                                  String fileName,
                                                  String... depthSegments)
                                           throws Exception
        Compare the files in folder with what we expect to see. When comparing file content, filter out whitespace which will replace all whitespace with a single space in the actual file content and the expected file content in order to avoid problems with differences caused by code formatting options where the test suite is run. Then a simple string comparison is done.
        Parameters:
        generatedFolder - the generated folder
        modelProject - the project containing the model
        fileName - the filename to compare
        depthSegments - hierarchical folders, if any
        Throws:
        Exception
